title: Brad Pitt IS ... Joe Exotic? Americans Stay Snitching 4.3.20
itunes:title: Brad Pitt IS ... Joe Exotic? Americans Stay Snitching 4.3.20
description:
In episode 601, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by Pallavi Gunalan to discuss updates on the coronavirus spread, how snitching has gone up, all Los Angeles residents being ordered to wear a mask, alcohol making a come back, Joe Exotic speaking out about his own casting, the Paycheck Protection Plan, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Coronavirus in the U.S.: Latest Map and Case Count
  2. America is the first country in the world with more than 1,000 coronavirus deaths in a day as fears grow that Detroit will be next epicenter after Michigan deaths double in three days
  3. Residents snitch on businesses, neighbors amid shutdowns
  4. Los Angeles mayor says all residents should wear masks
  5. It’s Time to Make Your Own Face Mask
  6. Millennials Killed Alcohol But the Pandemic Brought It Back
  7. Joe Exotic wants Brad Pitt or ‘Joe Dirt’ to play him in ‘Tiger King’ biopic
  8. Tiger King director says Joe Exotic is ‘categorically’ a racist
  9. WATCH: Spade Chats With Kelci Saffery from Netflix’s “Tiger King” - Lights Out Lo-Fi Chats (Mar 27, 2020)
  10. Paycheck Protection Program (PPP)
  11. WATCH: barnes blvd. - now, i see

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
